Welcome to PprzLink's documentation!
====================================

Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   python/messages
   python/transport
   python/ivy
   python/serial

PprzLink is a message toolkit (message definition, code generators, libraries) to be used with `Paparazzi UAV <http://paparazziuav.org>`_ and compatible systems.
